name: Blackjack Switch Analyzer
description:
Blackjack Switch is a fun twist on the popular casino classic. You play two hands of blackjack and you have the option of switching the front cards to make better hands.

If you've ever played Blackjack Switch in a casino or online, chances are you've been playing it incorrectly! The Blackjack Switch Analyzer can help you play each hand perfectly and reduce the house edge to 0.16% in most casinos.

Features:
* Determine whether you should switch your cards or play them as they were dealt
* Look up the house advantage for each possible match up
* Study the included basic strategy chart which can vary based on the house rules
* Determine the overall house advantage for the house rules offered
